title: BITNAP
summary: A collaborative iOS dream journal app concept focused on symbolism, mood tracking, and chaos. Designed in Figma and currently in development using React. Future plans include AI-powered dream analysis and integrations with Apple Health.

plan_wireframes.text: The initial plan for Bitnap came out of a chaotic brainstorm around symbolic dream tracking and generative art. Wireframes were designed in Figma to simulate a retrofuturistic dream terminal — complete with fake glitch lines, tag-based navigation, and subtle pixel art vibes.

dev_method.text: Bitnap is being built in React using Vite. Mood tagging, symbol frequency tracking, and journal prompts are handled through reusable components and state management hooks. Eventually, AI-generated dream insights and HealthKit data integration are planned.

final_version.text: Still in development. Final version will feature mood-based theming, recurring symbol analytics, and dreamy transitions. Designed to help chaotic brains bring a little narrative to the mess.

title: DISINFOQUEST
summary: A gamified educational tool built entirely in React, designed to help 18–25 year olds recognise online radicalisation and misinformation.

plan_wireframes.text: Figma wireframes mapped out various 'quest' paths, including fake chatrooms and sketchy social media posts. Each route ends in a different consequence, based on user choices.

dev_method.text: Built in React with page-based routing and conditional rendering to simulate game progression. Used inline pixel art and CSS animations for style.

final_version.text: Playable browser demo includes easter eggs, fake account profiles, and a points system. Designed to be chaotic and engaging to keep young users hooked.

title: UNGAK
summary: A Photoshop-based concept landing page designed for Ungak, a visual/graphic artist.

plan_wireframes.text: Initial sketches explored grunge and experimental art vibes to match the artist's online aesthetic. Mockups featured layered textures, muted tones, and geometric placements.

dev_method.text: Fully designed in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Exported layered comps for future dev handoff.

final_version.text: Static concept delivery with final mockups and style guides. Not deployed but used as reference for portfolio branding.

title: HIRAETH
summary: A collaborative narrative game demo with a soft glitchcore aesthetic and heavy lore energy.

plan_wireframes.text: Storyboarding and world design sketches emphasized themes of loss, liminality, and memory. Created character sheets and environment mockups.

dev_method.text: Built in Unity using C#. Dialog and cutscenes were handled using Ink, and all assets were imported via custom pipelines. Code handled basic collision, narrative triggers, and audio effects.

final_version.text: Playable short demo with glitch transitions, ambient soundtrack, and introspective tone. Used for university showcase.

title: GOOD FOR YOU
summary: A full rebrand and digital strategy for a local beauty salon, including logo, print, and web.

plan_wireframes.text: Client questionnaire helped define target audience and visual goals. Wireframes designed with a clean, soft palette and luxury-lite vibe.

dev_method.text: Logo and brand guidelines created in Illustrator. Website built using vanilla HTML/CSS with light JS animations and a third-party booking tool integration.

final_version.text: Live site delivered with responsive design, social links, and custom-printed flyers for in-store display.

title: NEO'S PIZZA
summary: Ongoing design support for a local pizza shop: print, menu, posters, social media templates.

plan_wireframes.text: Developed a retro but bold visual identity, with loud graphics and hand-drawn icons to match the owner's vibe.

dev_method.text: Assets created in Illustrator and Photoshop. Templates for weekly deals and stories delivered via Canva and PSDs.

final_version.text: Regularly updated IG carousel posts, in-store menus, and flyers. Brand voice is casual and slightly unhinged (like the owner).

title: TOP NOTCH CLEANING
summary: A branding and website overhaul for a local cleaning business, focused on clarity and professionalism.

plan_wireframes.text: Moodboards helped identify clean, airy visual language. UX flow was designed around quick quote requests and mobile visibility.

dev_method.text: Custom theme in WordPress using HTML, CSS, and JS. Installed plugins for contact forms, testimonials, and Google Maps.

final_version.text: Site handed off with training docs. Business cards, email templates, and a style guide were included in final deliverables.

title: QUOTES APP
summary: A quote-saving app built in Replit with clean UI and basic user input functionality.

plan_wireframes.text: Simple paper sketches evolved into a clean digital UI with typography-inspired layout.

dev_method.text: HTML/CSS frontend with JavaScript interactivity. Python backend handled user submission logic and saving quotes.

final_version.text: Deployed on Replit. User can view, add, and remove quotes in real time. Bookish aesthetic and responsive layout.
